page.title: 19PENRITH STABLE GIRL
page.content: I go to George Bowmans stables which is near to where I live..Most of the time I help cleaning the stables out, and sometimes I go riding in the training school.George Bowman is the local horse team driver.He once took the Duke of Edinburgh round Lowther Horse Trials.He is good friends with the Queen.He has two boys one called Brian & the other called Andrew.Andrew also goes horse riding. I spend nearly all my spare time watching him training the horses in the training school.After he has finished training them he washes them down with the hosepipe. I usually hold the horses for him.We then put them out in the fields and then clean the stables out.Then we give them clean water and food.We then put them in to the stables and go home.
